title: our social media confessions: unfollowing, screen time reveal, boundaries
itunes:title: our social media confessions: unfollowing, screen time reveal, boundaries
description:
Brooke and Danielle are back this week and discussing overthinking on social media.  The gals discuss questions like is unfollowing someone ok?  How much time on social media is TOO much time?  Do we overthink who to follow/who follows us?  Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies/screenshots!


Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/ 


Danielle’s fav Midi Skirt https://go.magik.ly/ml/17eil/   
Brooke’s fav sunscreen https://bit.ly/3uXIkZ1 


Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio 
Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/ 

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan 
Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/

Please support the show by checking out our sponsors!
